TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All units with Poison combat strength inflict this effect on enemies they damage
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Toutes les unités provoquant des dégâts de type Poison empoisonneront les ennemis qu'elles endommagent.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cet état ne disparait qu'une fois l'unité complètement guérie.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alle Einheiten mit der Eigenschaft Giftangriff, fügen ihren Feinden diesen Schaden zu.[ICON_BULLET]Die Vergiftung hält so lange an, bis die betreffende Einheit vollständig geheilt wurde.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]All units with Poison combat strength inflict this effect on enemies they damage
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]All units with Poison combat strength inflict this effect on enemies they damage

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet à l'unité d'attaquer et de capturer des bateaux.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 1 spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet à l'unité d'apprendre des sorts de niveau 1.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zauber der Stufe I können erlernt werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 1 spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 1 spells

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 2 spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet à l'unité d'apprendre des sorts de niveau 2.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zauber der Stufe II können erlernt werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 2 spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 2 spells

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 3 spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet à l'unité d'apprendre des sorts de niveau 3.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zauber der Stufe III können erlernt werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 3 spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to learn rank 3 spells

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Passes the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion to enemies in combat
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Donne la promotion [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] aux ennemis en combat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gibt die [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] Beförderung an Feinde im Kampf
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Passes the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion to enemies in combat
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Passes the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion to enemies in combat

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance of converting defeated living units
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% de chances de convertir des unités vivantes vaincues
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% Chance besiegte lebende Einheiten zu konvertieren
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance of converting defeated living units
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% chance of converting defeated living units

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Heilt %D1% nach dem er eine Einheit im Kampf getötet hat

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% strength when within the player's borders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% à l'interieur des frontières du joueur
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% Stärke wenn innerhalb der Grenzen des Spielers
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% strength when within the player's borders
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1% strength when within the player's borders

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The unit automatically casts the [LINK=SPELL_CROWN_OF_BRILLANCE]Crown of Brilliance[\LINK] spell each turn
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]The unit automatically casts the [LINK=SPELL_CROWN_OF_BRILLANCE]Crown of Brilliance[\LINK] spell each turn
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Einheit zaubert automatisch jede Runde den Zauber [LINK=SPELL_CROWN_OF_BRILLANCE]Glänzende Krone[\LINK]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The unit automatically casts the [LINK=SPELL_CROWN_OF_BRILLANCE]Crown of Brilliance[\LINK] spell each turn
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]The unit automatically casts the [LINK=SPELL_CROWN_OF_BRILLANCE]Crown of Brilliance[\LINK] spell each turn

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% de chance de déclencher des frappes défensives
[ICON_BULLET]Les frappes défensives font +%d1% dégâts en plus

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% chance to do +%d2% damage to units attacking this unit's stack
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ajoute %d1% de chance de faire %d2% de dégâts aux unités attaquant la case
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% chance to do +%d2% damage to units attacking this unit's stack
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% chance to do +%d2% damage to units attacking this unit's stack
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+%d1% chance to do +%d2% damage to units attacking this unit's stack

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to cast Divine spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet à l'unité de lancer des sorts divins.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ermöglicht der Einheit göttliche Magie zu wirken.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to cast Divine spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to cast Divine spells

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Double le bonus de fortification de l'unité

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unit will be controlled by the AI and will be extremely aggressive
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité sera contrôlée par l'IA et sera extrêmement agressive
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Einheit wird von der KI kontrolliert und ist extrem aggressiv
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Unit will be controlled by the AI and will be extremely aggressive
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Unit will be controlled by the AI and will be extremely aggressive

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Causes fear, scattering units in tiles it attacks[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can stop enemy attacks on him.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chance depends on strength and experience of both units.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut disperser les unités ennemies présentes sur la case qu'il attaque[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut stopper les unités qui l'attaquent[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]L'efficacité dépend des forces et expériences relatives.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Angreifer dieser Einheit brechen möglicherweise ihren Angriff ab und fliehen.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can stop enemy attacks on him.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chance depends on strength and experience of both units.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Causes fear, scattering units in tiles it attacks[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can stop enemy attacks on him.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chance depends on strength and experience of both units.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Causes fear, scattering units in tiles it attacks[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can stop enemy attacks on him.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chance depends on strength and experience of both units.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit the ability to fly
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Donne à l'unité la capacité de voler
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gibt der Einheit die Fähigkeit zu fliegen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit the ability to fly
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit the ability to fly

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Used to indicate that a Great Commander is joined with this unit
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Utilisé pour indiquer qu'un Commandant Illustre est adjoint à cette unité.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kennzeichnet eine von einem genialen Feldherrn angeführte Einheit.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Used to indicate that a Great Commander is joined with this unit
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Used to indicate that a Great Commander is joined with this unit

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Keeps the unit from being able to move
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Hält die Einheit davon ab sich zu bewegen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Keeps the unit from being able to move
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Keeps the unit from being able to move

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num Points Bonus de Force de Défense

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Resurrected in the civilization's capital if killed
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Une unité tuée ayant cette promotion est ressuscitée dans la capitale de sa civilisation.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Getötete Einheiten werden in der Hauptstadt wiederbelebt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Resurrected in the civilization's capital if killed
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Resurrected in the civilization's capital if killed

TEXT.English: Allows the unit to use the Inquisition ability
TEXT.French: Permet à l'unité d'utiliser la capacité Inquisition
TEXT.German: Erlaubt der Einheit Nicht-Staatsreligionen zu entfernen
TEXT.Italian: Allows the unit to use the Inquisition ability
TEXT.Spanish: Allows the unit to use the Inquisition ability

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A loyal unit will die instead of being converted to an opponent's cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the Charm Person spell
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Une unité loyale meurt plutôt que d'être convertie à la cause d'un adversaire.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine loyale Einheit stirbt, anstatt zum Gegner überzulaufen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Es besteht eine Wahrscheinlichkeit von 20%, dass die Einheit dem Beeindrucken Zauber widersteht.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A loyal unit will die instead of being converted to an opponent's cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the Charm Person spell
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]A loyal unit will die instead of being converted to an opponent's cause[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit is 20% more likely to resist the Charm Person spell

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance of being affected by enemy spells
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Réduit la probabilité d'être affecté par un sort ennemi.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Vermindert die Wahrscheinlichkeit von feindlichen Zaubersprüchen betroffen zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance of being affected by enemy spells
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Reduces the chance of being affected by enemy spells

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Used to mark a unit that has been affected by the Mutate spell
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Utilisé pour indiquer que l'unité a été affectée par le sort Mutation.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Used to mark a unit that has been affected by the Mutate spell
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Used to mark a unit that has been affected by the Mutate spell

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Units with this promotion are not alive
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les unités possédant cette promotion ne sont pas vivantes
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Einheiten mit dieser Beförderung sind nicht lebendig
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Units with this promotion are not alive
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Units with this promotion are not alive

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Has a chance of spreading the plague during combat to units in the defending and attacking stacks
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]A une chance de propager la peste aux unités de la pile d'attaque et de la pile de défense lors d'un combat.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Es besteht die Chance, das sich Einheiten während eines Kampfes mit der Seuche infizieren.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Has a chance of spreading the plague during combat to units in the defending and attacking stacks
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Has a chance of spreading the plague during combat to units in the defending and attacking stacks

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The Armageddon Counter is increased when this unit is created and decreased when it is killed
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Le Compteur Armageddon est incrémenté quand l'unité est créée et décrémenté quand elle est tuée.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Der Armageddonzähler wird erhöht, wenn diese Einheit erschaffen wird und gesenkt, wenn sie stirbt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The Armageddon Counter is increased when this unit is created and decreased when it is killed
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]The Armageddon Counter is increased when this unit is created and decreased when it is killed

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removed by casting spells or using special abilities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Enlevé en lançant un sort ou en utilisant une capacité spéciale
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Entfernt wegen eines gesprochenen Zaubers oder wegen Benutzen von speziellen Fähigkeiten
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Removed by casting spells or using special abilities
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Removed by casting spells or using special abilities

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removed when the unit is fully healed
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]entfernt wenn die Einheit vollständig geheilt ist
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Removed when the unit is fully healed
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Removed when the unit is fully healed

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]This effect can be removed by visiting a city with a forge in it
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Cet effet peut être supprimé en allant dans une ville possédant une Forge.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Dieser Effekt kann durch einen Besuch einer Stadt mit einer Schmiede aufgehoben werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]This effect can be removed by visiting a city with a forge in it
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]This effect can be removed by visiting a city with a forge in it

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to see invisible units
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to see invisible units
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erlaubt der Einheit unsichtbare Einheiten zu sehen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to see invisible units
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to see invisible units

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente le taux de gain d'exp des lanceurs de sort.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhöht die Geschwindigkeit mit der der Zaubernde Erfahrungspunkte erhält

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A Spellstaff can be broken to allow the caster to regain the ability to cast
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Une Baguette Magique peut être brisée pour permettre au lancer de regagner la capacité de lancer.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ein Zauberstab kann für das Wirken eines weiteren Zauberspruchs zerbrochen werden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A Spellstaff can be broken to allow the caster to regain the ability to cast
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]A Spellstaff can be broken to allow the caster to regain the ability to cast

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A unit with a Spirit Guide passes a portion of its experience to another unit when it dies
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Une unité avec un Guide Spirituel transmet la moitié de son expérience à une unité alliée lorsqu'elle meurt.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine Einheit mit Guru überträgt im Falle einer Niederlage im Kampf einen Teil seiner Erfahrung an befreundete Einheiten im Stack.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A unit with a Spirit Guide passes a portion of its experience to another unit when it dies
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]A unit with a Spirit Guide passes a portion of its experience to another unit when it dies

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit a percentage bonus equal to half the Armageddon count
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Accorde à l'unité un bonus de combat égal à la moitié du Compteur d'Armageddon.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gewährt der Einheit einen prozentualen Bonus, welcher der Hälfte des Armageddonzählers entspricht.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit a percentage bonus equal to half the Armageddon count
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the unit a percentage bonus equal to half the Armageddon count

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can cast an extra spell each turn
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can cast an extra spell each turn
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann jede Runde einen zusätzlichen Zauber wirken
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Can cast an extra spell each turn
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Can cast an extra spell each turn

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the rate arcane and religious casters gain xp
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la vitesse de gain d'expérience des lanceurs de sorts.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Steigert die Rate, mit der der Zaubernde Erfahrungspunkte erhält.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the rate arcane and religious casters gain xp
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the rate arcane and religious casters gain xp

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to travel over water tiles
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erlaubt der Einheit über Wasser zu gehen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to travel over water tiles
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Allows the unit to travel over water tiles

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become Ravenous Werewolves under the werewolf's owner's control
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les unités tuées par un loup-garou deviennent des loups-garous voraces sous le contrôle du propriétaire du loup-garou.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Von einem Werwolf besiegte Einheiten verwandeln sich selbst in Lechzende Werwölfe und folgen ihrem Herrn.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become Ravenous Werewolves under the werewolf's owner's control
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Units killed by a Werewolf become Ravenous Werewolves under the werewolf's owner's control

TEXT.English: Keeper of the Waters of Birth
TEXT.French: Keeper of the Waters of Birth
TEXT.German: Keeper of the Waters of Birth
TEXT.Italian: Keeper of the Waters of Birth
TEXT.Spanish: Keeper of the Waters of Birth

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the Crusader Promotion after Combat Victory.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the Crusader Promotion after Combat Victory.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the Crusader Promotion after Combat Victory.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the Crusader Promotion after Combat Victory.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants the Crusader Promotion after Combat Victory.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]If killed in battle, this Unit Will join their opponent as an Undead.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]If killed in battle, this Unit Will join their opponent as an Undead.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]If killed in battle, this Unit Will join their opponent as an Undead.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]If killed in battle, this Unit Will join their opponent as an Undead.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]If killed in battle, this Unit Will join their opponent as an Undead.

TEXT.English: The product of an angelic and a mortal parent. Aasimar weren't unusual before the compact was signed and many men could trace a remote angelic parentage at some point in their ancestry. Many angels watch over their distant descendants and take pride in those that continue to display their virtues..
TEXT.French: The product of an angelic and a mortal parent. Aasimar weren't unusual before the compact was signed and many men could trace a remote angelic parentage at some point in their ancestry. Many angels watch over their distant descendants and take pride in those that continue to display their virtues..
TEXT.German: The product of an angelic and a mortal parent. Aasimar weren't unusual before the compact was signed and many men could trace a remote angelic parentage at some point in their ancestry. Many angels watch over their distant descendants and take pride in those that continue to display their virtues..
TEXT.Italian: The product of an angelic and a mortal parent. Aasimar weren't unusual before the compact was signed and many men could trace a remote angelic parentage at some point in their ancestry. Many angels watch over their distant descendants and take pride in those that continue to display their virtues..
TEXT.Spanish: The product of an angelic and a mortal parent. Aasimar weren't unusual before the compact was signed and many men could trace a remote angelic parentage at some point in their ancestry. Many angels watch over their distant descendants and take pride in those that continue to display their virtues..

TEXT.English: The product of a demonic and a mortal parent. Just as the unions of angelic and human parents wasn't uncommon before the compact was signed, neither were births between demons and humans. As with the Aasimar demons often take great interest in those who share their bloodline.
TEXT.French: The product of a demonic and a mortal parent. Just as the unions of angelic and human parents wasn't uncommon before the compact was signed, neither were births between demons and humans. As with the Aasimar demons often take great interest in those who share their bloodline.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increases Armageddon Counter by 1 after each battle.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Le Compteur Armageddon augmente de 1 point après chaque bataille.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Increases Armageddon Counter by 1 after each battle.
